verbs.description: Pat Boone , [ARG1: terrible singer] [V: turned] [ARG2: terrible writer] [ARGM-GOL: for the Worldnetdaily] , is pulling a trick that right - wing Christians often do , citing the Bible about God putting all political leaders in power and warning that he will punish those who resist them — but only if Boone likes them , it seems . “ Warning : Divine Judgment Awaits Trump Haters ” …
